mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point (uuid, onhqt, recqt, issqt) SELECT uuid, (SUM(recqt) - SUM(issqt)) AS current_onhqt, SUM(recqt) AS total_recqt, SUM(issqt) AS total_issqt FROM pthisttb WHERE uuid = #{uuid} GROUP BY uuid;
mapper.update: UPDATE point p JOIN ( SELECT uuid, SUM(recqt) AS total_recqt, SUM(issqt) AS total_issqt, (SUM(recqt) - SUM(issqt)) AS current_onhqt FROM pthisttb WHERE uuid = #{uuid} GROUP BY uuid ) AS hist ON p.uuid = hist.uuid SET p.recqt = hist.total_recqt, p.issqt = hist.total_issqt, p.onhqt = hist.current_onhqt, p.mdate = now();
